verses.verse: וַיִּשָּׂ֨א <WH5375> lifted up יַעֲקֹ֜ב <WH3290> And Jacob עֵינָ֗יו <WH5869> his eyes וַיַּרְא֙ <WH7200> and looked וְהִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> and behold עֵשָׂ֣ו <WH6215> and behold Esau בָּ֔א <WH935> came וְעִמּ֕וֹ <WH5973> with אַרְבַּ֥ע <WH702> and with him four מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred אִ֑ישׁ <WH376> men וַיַּ֣חַץ <WH2673> And he divided אֶת־ <WH853> הַיְלָדִ֗ים <WH3206> the children עַל־ <WH5921> among לֵאָה֙ <WH3812> unto Leah וְעַל־ <WH5921> among רָחֵ֔ל <WH7354> and unto Rachel וְעַ֖ל <WH5921> among שְׁתֵּ֥י <WH8147> and unto the two הַשְּׁפָחֽוֹת׃ <WH8198> handmaids

וַיָּ֧שֶׂם <WH7760> And he put אֶת־ <WH853> הַשְּׁפָח֛וֹת <WH8198> the handmaids וְאֶת־ <WH853> יַלְדֵיהֶ֖ן <WH3206> and their children רִֽאשֹׁנָ֑ה <WH7223> foremost וְאֶת־ <WH853> לֵאָ֤ה <WH3812> and Leah וִֽילָדֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH3206> and her children אַחֲרֹנִ֔ים <WH314> after וְאֶת־ <WH853> רָחֵ֥ל <WH7354> and Rachel וְאֶת־ <WH853> יוֹסֵ֖ף <WH3130> and Joseph אַחֲרֹנִֽים׃ <WH314> hindermost

וְה֖וּא <WH1931> himself עָבַ֣ר <WH5674> And he passed over לִפְנֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6440> before them וַיִּשְׁתַּ֤חוּ <WH7812> and bowed himself אַ֙רְצָה֙ <WH776> to the ground שֶׁ֣בַע <WH7651> seven פְּעָמִ֔ים <WH6471> times עַד־ <WH5704> until גִּשְׁתּ֖וֹ <WH5066> until he came near עַד־ <WH5704> until אָחִֽיו׃ <WH251> to his brother

וַיָּ֨רָץ <WH7323> ran עֵשָׂ֤ו <WH6215> And Esau לִקְרָאתוֹ֙ <WH7125> to meet him וַֽיְחַבְּקֵ֔הוּ <WH2263> and embraced וַיִּפֹּ֥ל <WH5307> him and fell עַל־ <WH5921> on צַוָּארָ֖ו <WH6677> on his neck וַׅיִּׅשָּׁׅקֵ֑ׅהׅוּׅ <WH5401> and kissed him וַיִּבְכּֽוּ׃ <WH1058> and they wept

וַיִּשָּׂ֣א <WH5375> And he lifted up אֶת־ <WH853> עֵינָ֗יו <WH5869> his eyes וַיַּ֤רְא <WH7200> and saw אֶת־ <WH853> הַנָּשִׁים֙ <WH802> the women וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַיְלָדִ֔ים <WH3206> and the children וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> and said מִי־ <WH4310> Who אֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> Who [are] those לָּ֑ךְ וַיֹּאמַ֕ר <WH559> with thee? And he said הַיְלָדִ֕ים <WH3206> The children אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom חָנַ֥ן <WH2603> hath graciously given אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> which God אֶת־ <WH853> עַבְדֶּֽךָ׃ <WH5650> thy servant

וַתִּגַּ֧שְׁןָ <WH5066> came near הַשְּׁפָח֛וֹת <WH8198> Then the handmaidens הֵ֥נָּה <WH2007> with וְיַלְדֵיהֶ֖ן <WH3206> they and their children וַתִּֽשְׁתַּחֲוֶֽיןָ׃ <WH7812> and they bowed themselves

וַתִּגַּ֧שׁ <WH5066> came near גַּם־ <WH1571> likewise לֵאָ֛ה <WH3812> And Leah וִילָדֶ֖יהָ <WH3206> also with her children וַיִּֽשְׁתַּחֲו֑וּ <WH7812> and bowed themselves וְאַחַ֗ר <WH310> and after נִגַּ֥שׁ <WH5066> near יוֹסֵ֛ף <WH3130> Joseph וְרָחֵ֖ל <WH7354> and Rachel וַיִּֽשְׁתַּחֲוֽוּ׃ <WH7812> and they bowed

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> And he said מִ֥י <WH4310> What לְךָ֛ כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַמַּחֲנֶ֥ה <WH4264> What [meanest] thou by all this drove הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which פָּגָ֑שְׁתִּי <WH6298> which I met וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> ? And he said לִמְצֹא־ <WH4672> [These are] to find חֵ֖ן <WH2580> grace בְּעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> in the sight אֲדֹנִֽי׃ <WH113> of my lord
וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said עֵשָׂ֖ו <WH6215> And Esau יֶשׁ־ <WH3426> I have לִ֣י רָ֑ב <WH7227> enough אָחִ֕י <WH251> my brother יְהִ֥י <WH1961> have לְךָ֖ אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> what לָֽךְ׃

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said יַעֲקֹ֗ב <WH3290> And Jacob אַל־ <WH408> No נָא֙ <WH4994> please אִם־ <WH518> if נָ֨א <WH4994> now מָצָ֤אתִי <WH4672> Nay I pray thee if now I have found חֵן֙ <WH2580> grace בְּעֵינֶ֔יךָ <WH5869> in thy sight וְלָקַחְתָּ֥ <WH3947> then receive מִנְחָתִ֖י <WH4503> my present מִיָּדִ֑י <WH3027> at my hand כִּ֣י <WH3588> for עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֞ן <WH3651> after that רָאִ֣יתִי <WH7200> for therefore I have seen פָנֶ֗יךָ <WH6440> thy face כִּרְאֹ֛ת <WH7200> as though I had seen פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> the face אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> of God וַתִּרְצֵֽנִי׃ <WH7521> and thou wast pleased with me

קַח־ <WH3947> Take נָ֤א <WH4994> Please אֶת־ <WH853> בִּרְכָתִי֙ <WH1293> I pray thee my blessing אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which הֻבָ֣את <WH935> that is brought לָ֔ךְ כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because חַנַּ֥נִי <WH2603> hath dealt graciously with me אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> to thee because God וְכִ֣י <WH3588> and because יֶשׁ־ <WH3426> I have לִי־ כֹ֑ל <WH3605> enough וַיִּפְצַר־ <WH6484> And he urged בּ֖וֹ וַיִּקָּֽח׃ <WH3947> him and he took
וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> And he said נִסְעָ֣ה <WH5265> Let us take our journey וְנֵלֵ֑כָה <WH1980> and go וְאֵלְכָ֖ה <WH1980> will go לְנֶגְדֶּֽךָ׃ <WH5048> before

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> to him אֲדֹנִ֤י <WH113> unto him My lord יֹדֵ֙עַ֙ <WH3045> knoweth כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that הַיְלָדִ֣ים <WH3206> that the children רַכִּ֔ים <WH7390> [are] tender וְהַצֹּ֥אן <WH6629> and the flocks וְהַבָּקָ֖ר <WH1241> and herds עָל֣וֹת <WH5763> with young עָלָ֑י <WH5921> care וּדְפָקוּם֙ <WH1849> [are] with me and if men should overdrive י֣וֹם <WH3117> day אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> them one וָמֵ֖תוּ <WH4191> will die כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַצֹּֽאן׃ <WH6629> all the flock

יַעֲבָר־ <WH5674> I pray thee pass over נָ֥א <WH4994> Please אֲדֹנִ֖י <WH113> Let my lord לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before עַבְדּ֑וֹ <WH5650> his servant וַאֲנִ֞י <WH589> and I אֶֽתְנָהֲלָ֣ה <WH5095> and I will lead on לְאִטִּ֗י <WH328> softly לְרֶ֨גֶל <WH7272> according as הַמְּלָאכָ֤ה <WH4399> the cattle אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> that לְפָנַי֙ <WH6440> that goeth before me וּלְרֶ֣גֶל <WH7272> be able to endure הַיְלָדִ֔ים <WH3206> and the children עַ֛ד <WH5704> against אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> I אָבֹ֥א <WH935> until I come אֶל־ <WH413> to אֲדֹנִ֖י <WH113> unto my lord שֵׂעִֽירָה׃ <WH8165> unto Seir

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said עֵשָׂ֔ו <WH6215> And Esau אַצִּֽיגָה־ <WH3322> Let me now leave נָּ֣א <WH4994> Please עִמְּךָ֔ <WH5973> you מִן־ <WH4480> some הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> with thee [some] of the folk אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who אִתִּ֑י <WH854> he וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> that [are] with me And he said לָ֣מָּה <WH4100> What זֶּ֔ה <WH2088> me אֶמְצָא־ <WH4672> needeth it? let me find חֵ֖ן <WH2580> grace בְּעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> in the sight אֲדֹנִֽי׃ <WH113> of my lord
וַיָּשָׁב֩ <WH7725> returned בַּיּ֨וֹם <WH3117> that day הַה֥וּא <WH1931> he עֵשָׂ֛ו <WH6215> So Esau לְדַרְכּ֖וֹ <WH1870> on his way שֵׂעִֽירָה׃ <WH8165> unto Seir

וְיַעֲקֹב֙ <WH3290> And Jacob נָסַ֣ע <WH5265> journeyed סֻכֹּ֔תָה <WH5523> to Succoth וַיִּ֥בֶן <WH1129> and built ל֖וֹ בָּ֑יִת <WH1004> him an house וּלְמִקְנֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH4735> for his cattle עָשָׂ֣ה <WH6213> and made סֻכֹּ֔ת <WH5521> booths עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֛ן <WH3651> after that קָרָ֥א <WH7121> is called שֵׁם־ <WH8034> therefore the name הַמָּק֖וֹם <WH4725> of the place סֻכּֽוֹת׃ <WH5523> Succoth ס

וַיָּבֹא֩ <WH935> came יַעֲקֹ֨ב <WH3290> And Jacob שָׁלֵ֜ם <WH8003> safely עִ֣יר <WH5892> a city שְׁכֶ֗ם <WH7927> of Shechem אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> which בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> which [is] in the land כְּנַ֔עַן <WH3667> of Canaan בְּבֹא֖וֹ <WH935> when he came מִפַּדַּ֣ן אֲרָ֑ם <WH6307> from Padanaram וַיִּ֖חַן <WH2583> and pitched his tent אֶת־ <WH853> פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> before הָעִֽיר׃ <WH5892> the city

וַיִּ֜קֶן <WH7069> And he bought אֶת־ <WH853> חֶלְקַ֣ת <WH2513> a parcel הַשָּׂדֶ֗ה <WH7704> of a field אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> he נָֽטָה־ <WH5186> where he had spread שָׁם֙ <WH8033> in it אָהֳל֔וֹ <WH168> his tent מִיַּ֥ד <WH3027> at the hand בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children חֲמ֖וֹר <WH2544> of Hamor אֲבִ֣י <WH1> father שְׁכֶ֑ם <WH7927> Shechem's בְּמֵאָ֖ה <WH3967> for an hundred קְשִׂיטָֽה׃ <WH7192> pieces of money

וַיַּצֶּב־ <WH5324> And he erected שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> there מִזְבֵּ֑חַ <WH4196> there an altar וַיִּ֨קְרָא־ <WH7121> and called it ל֔וֹ אֵ֖ל <WH410> God אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> angels יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Israel ס
